text: Molly Gray (born March 18, 1984) is an American attorney and politician. She is a member of the Democratic Party. She was the 83rd lieutenant governor of Vermont from 2021 to 2023. She is the fourth woman to serve as Vermont's lieutenant governor. In December 2021, Gray announced that she would be a candidate for the U.S. House of Representatives in 2022. She lost the Democratic nomination in August 2022 to Becca Balint. ==References== Category:1984 births Category:Lieutenant Governors of Vermont Category:Living people Category:Lawyers from Vermont Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Molly Gray
